title: 加入服务器后客户端崩溃
author: kunpaku
txt_content:
客户端和服务端的mod.png (202.94 KB, 下载次数: 0)

下载附件

2020-8-7 14:03 上传




客户端和服务端的mod见上图
上传了.minecraft/crash-reports下的崩溃报告

崩溃时客户端弹出的日志略去了info,只截取了近几分钟的信息

服务端显示内容如下：
>^M[13:53:04 INFO]: UUID of player Kun_Project is d71af5f7-9f3a-3aaa-bf99-d4b15f5d3c08
>^M[13:53:04 INFO]: Client protocol version 2
>^M[13:53:04 INFO]: Client attempting to join with 64 mods : arcane_engineering@0.2.7,NotEnoughItems@1.0.3.74,Thaumcraft@4.2.3.5,TConstruct@1.7.10-1.8.8.build991,PlayerAPI@1.0,Eln@51,DynamicLights_onFire@1.0.5,DynamicLights@1.3.9,DynamicLights_floodLights@1.0.2,essentialcraft@4.6.1710.63,MouseTweaks@2.4.4,ImmersiveEngineering@0.7.7,NuclearCraft@1.9g,mcp@9.05,Mantle@1.7.10-0.3.2.jenkins191,TSteelworks@1.7.10-1.1.2,DummyCore@1.13,DraconicEvolution@1.0.2h,inventorytweaks@1.59-dev-156-af3bc68,technom@0.12.5,ThermalExpansion@1.7.10R4.1.5,DurabilityShow@1.2.0,EMT@1.2.2,ExtraUtilities@1.2.9,mod_ecru_MapleTree@1.1.30j,GraviSuite@1.7.10-2.0.3,technomCore@0.12.5,ForbiddenMagic@1.7.10-0.575,ThermalFoundation@1.7.10R1.2.6,gregtech@MC1710,BrandonsCore@1.0.0.12,DynamicLights_dropItems@1.0.8,CoFHCore@1.7.10R3.1.4,ThaumicHorizons@1.1.9,DynamicLights_entityClasses@1.0.1,UnicodeFontFixer@1.1.12-mc1.7.10,WIT@1.0.8,Forge@10.13.4.1558,DynamicLights_otherPlayers@1.0.8,DynamicLights_mobEquipment@1.0.8,thaumicbases@1.3.1710.2,CodeChickenCore@1.0.4.29,ThaumicTinkerer@unspecified,XaeroMinimap@1.9.1.2,DynamicLights_flameArrows@1.0.0,AdvancedSolarPanel@1.7.10-3.5.1,IC2@2.2.828-experimental,cookiecore@1.4.0,ThaumicTinkerer-preloader@0.1,ExtraBotany@r1.0-20,DamageIndicatorsMod@3.2.0,DynamicLights_creepers@1.0.4,InputFix@1.7.10-v5,FML@7.10.99.99,cfm@3.4.7,essenthaum@1.1.1710.0,<CoFH ASM>@000,Baubles@1.0.1.10,recipehandler@1.7.10,Automagy@0.28.2,FoodCraft@1.2.0,Botania@r1.8-249,DynamicLights_thePlayer@1.1.4,ChocoPatcher@1.2
>^M[13:53:04 INFO]: Attempting connection with missing mods [kimagine] at CLIENT

>^M[13:53:05 WARN]: Data not found for Kun_Project. Trying to load backup data.
>^M[13:53:05 WARN]: Thaumcraft data not found for Kun_Project. Trying to load backup Thaumcraft data.
>^M[13:53:05 INFO]: Assigning initial aspects to Kun_Project

>^M[13:53:05 INFO]: Kun_Project[/(此处为IP？也许需要**)] logged in with entity id 747 at ([world] 187.5, 66.0, 257.5)
>^M[13:53:05 INFO]: Kun_Project has just earned the achievement [You've been installed!]
>^M[13:53:06 WARN]: §4That kit does not exist.
>^M[13:53:12 INFO]: Kun_Project lost connection: Internal Exception: java.io.IOException: 远程主机强迫关闭了一个现有的连接。
>^M[13:53:12 INFO]: Kun_Project left the game.
>^M[14:00:31 INFO]: GroupManager - INFO -  Data files refreshed.









crash-2020-08-07_13.52.46-client.txt


2020-8-7 14:02 上传
点击文件名下载附件




12.03 KB, 下载次数: 2












崩溃时弹出来的日志.txt


2020-8-7 14:03 上传
点击文件名下载附件




12.89 KB, 下载次数: 4

replies.txt_content: nei和前置codechicken的问题，你看看版本有没有对应，或者删了试试

replies.author: 带带大乌龟
replies.txt_content: 尝试升级一下客户端forge版本

replies.author: kunpaku
replies.txt_content:
Snuorc 发表于 2020-8-7 14:14
尝试升级一下客户端forge版本
依然崩溃，崩溃报告如下：

replies.author: kunpaku
replies.txt_content:
1308147 发表于 2020-8-7 15:12
nei和前置codechicken的问题，你看看版本有没有对应，或者删了试试
非常感谢，删除NEI后可以进服务器了
最终方案为更新服务器与客户端的鸡骨头核心，并更新客户端的NEI
